snippet: “Encounters: Conflict, Dialogue, Discovery,” at the Princeton University Art Museum, is an earnest effort to explore how civilizations relate through “cultural objects.”
abstract: Martha Schwendener reviews exhibit Encounters: Conflict, Dialogue, Discovery at the Princeton University Art Museum (Metropolitan/New Jersey).
lead_paragraph: “Encounters: Conflict, Dialogue, Discovery,” at the Princeton University Art Museum, is an earnest effort to explore how civilizations relate through “cultural objects.”

headline.seo: A Review of ‘Encounters: Conflict, Dialogue, Discovery,’ in Princeton
headline.main: Centuries Apart, Cultures Speak to Each Other
headline.print_headline: Centuries Apart, Cultures Speak to Each Other
